talents.name: Adrenaline rush
talents.effects: Use up to 2 resolve immediately to remove 1 lvl 1 wound per resolve spent.

talents.name: Fast learner
talents.effects: Whenever you roll a cumulative check, reduce the number of successful checks by 1.

talents.name: Levitation
talents.effects: You can hover above solid ground.

talents.name: Loot goblin
talents.effects: When you obtain a special or rare item, gain 2 dice to add to any combination of rolls. The dice correspond to the type of dice used in the respective checks.

talents.name: Pirates reputation
talents.effects: Choose a striking physical feature like an eyepatch, scars or tattoos. Brandish your chosen feature to immediately gather interest and attention.

talents.name: Skill mastery
talents.prerequisites: A skill with +4 training, no more than 1 skill with +5 training
talents.effects: Choose a skill with +4 training, increase it to +5. You can learn this talent two times.

talents.name: Spidersense
talents.effects: The GM warns you of surprises but all details are left out.

talents.name: Thick hide
talents.effects: Gain 1 armor each rest.

talents.name: Tremorsense
talents.effects: You sense vibrations in the earth and do not need your eyes to see, as long as your feet touch the ground.

talents.name: Unending
talents.effects: If you would die, instead spend a charge of this talent.

talents.name: Vitality plus
talents.effects: You gain another empty lvl 1 wound permanently.

talents.name: Armor shred
talents.effects: Your attacks destroy your targets armor. You can harm and kill armored targets.

talents.name: Backstab
talents.effects: You are especially deadly when your enemy does not see you coming. Treat skirmish checks that target unsuspecting opponents as one stage better.

talents.name: Battle focus
talents.effects: Gain +1 to skirmish checks and +1 resolve that can only be used against conflict that would damage you, as long as you are in battle.

talents.name: Bloodbath
talents.effects: Bathe in blood to gain 1 temporary empty lvl 1 wound until your next rest.

talents.name: Brawler
talents.effects: Your unarmed attacks are just as deadly as if you were fighting with a weapon.

talents.name: Bring it on
talents.effects: When you are outnumbered, TODO

talents.name: Mighty blows
talents.effects: Even when your attacks do not kill your target, you still knock them to the ground.

talents.name: Cannonfire
talents.effects: Gain +2 to skirmish checks with stationary firearms and cannons.

talents.name: Careless fighting
talents.effects: Gain +2 on your next skirmish check, but gain conflict after.

talents.name: Charge with me
talents.effects: If you enter battle first and ahead of your allies, they gain +1 to all skirmish checks during battle.

talents.name: Constrictor
talents.effects: You only need to use one hand to restrict or grapple creatures.

talents.name: Critical attacks
talents.effects: If you exceed the target of a skirmish check by +7, lethally wound your opponent, regardless of the result.

talents.name: Dual wield
talents.effects: You can use two weapons at the same time, gaining both of their effects.

talents.name: Ethereal attacks
talents.effects: Your attacks can hits ethereal beings, like ghosts, wraiths, etc.

talents.name: Fair fight
talents.effects: While in single combat, gain +1 die to all skirmish checks.

talents.name: Flexible armor
talents.effects: Restrictions from wearing armor are reduced by 1.

talents.name: From the shadows
talents.effects: Attacking out of hiding does not reveal your position.

talents.name: Get down
talents.effects: When an ally in short range of you takes damage, you can take it instead.

talents.name: Instill fear
talents.effects: When you kill an enemy, instill others with fear.

talents.name: Lust for revenge
talents.effects: After you take damage, you can kill the source to remove the resulting wound.

talents.name: Mark for death
talents.effects: After you deal damage to an enemy you can mark them. An ally or yourself can consume the mark to recover 1 resolve when killing them.

talents.name: Parting attack
talents.effects: Taking an action to evade lets you deal minor damage to an enemy within your reach.

talents.name: Power through
talents.effects: When you take any wound, you can ignore it. You instead take a wound that is a lvl higher than the one you ignored after a medium duration.

talents.name: Reactionary resistance
talents.effects: When you are hit by a special type of damage, you gain 1 armor against that type until you are damaged by another special type of damage.

talents.name: Recovery
talents.effects: When you use a piece of ammunition you can spend a charge of this talent instead of losing ammo and reloading.

talents.name: Revel in pain
talents.effects: When you kill an enemy, gain another action instantly.

talents.name: Strongarm
talents.effects: You can wield heavy weapons with only one hand.

talents.name: Suave fighting
talents.effects: You can choose to use influence instead of skirmish for your checks during combat.

talents.name: Sword and powder
talents.prerequisites: melee weapon in one hand, firearm in the other hand
talents.effects: When you make a combat check against an enemy: G{Also shoot your pistol at any opponent} | Y{Shoot your pistol at your target}.

talents.name: Ultra heavy
talents.effects: You can use heavy objects like trees, anchors or boulders as heavy weapons.

talents.name: Weapons training
talents.effects: Choose a weapon type (light, medium, heavy, long, ranged, firearms or unarmed). Add +1 die to skirmish checks made with weapons of that type. You can learn this talent multiple times and choose different weapon types each time.

talents.name: Weapons expertise
talents.effects: Choose a specific weapon type and gain +1 to combat checks made with the chosen type. You can learn this talent multiple times and choose different weapon types each time.

talents.name: Arcane spellcasting
talents.effects: You gain the ability to create arcane effects and cast spells. (See the magic chapter for details) You gain a maximum of 5 arcane threads and can choose 1 of the arcane elements at lvl 1.

talents.name: Increase element
talents.effects: Increase an arcane element you control by 1 lvl. Also gain +5 to your maximum arcane threads. You can learn this talent multiple times.

talents.name: Arcane rituals
talents.effects: You gain access to arcane rituals, allowing you to use ritualistic instructions to create powerful, but slow effects. Make cumulative spellcasting checks when casting rituals.

talents.name: Elemental exploitation
talents.costs: A source of an element matching your arcane element when casting a spell
talents.effects: Consume an amount of an element to increase your next spells intensity by a number of d6s equal to the amount. (Based on GMs discretion)

talents.name: Static spell creation
talents.effects: You can create static spells with your knowledge of the arcane. Make a cumulative spellcasting check (5 checks, at least 3 successes) to manifest an effect of your choice in the world. You can then learn the static spell with 1 charge.

talents.name: Command
talents.effects: Give an ally a command. If the ally tries to follow it with their next action, they gain +1 die for the associated check.

talents.name: Honest exchange
talents.effects: You may ask a person any question and they answer truthfully. After that the person asks you a question and you have to answer truthfully. If you lie, you can never use this talent on the person again.

talents.name: Identity theft
talents.effects: You create a copy of a persons identity, including any documents used to prove your identity. This talent does not recharge normally on a rest, but instead after a week in the same city or town.

talents.name: Impostor
talents.effects: Your disguises are so good, that whenever you disguise yourself, skip the first two checks to determine whether you fool bystanders and your targets.

talents.name: In plain sight
talents.effects: You become so unobtrusive and nondescript, that only those who specifically search for you, can find you. Any person that witnesses you, will forget you after a short while unless you interact directly with them for a longer period of time.

talents.name: Lasting impression
talents.effects: After interacting with a person for a short time, gain +1 to all checks relating to that person from now on. This effect is only active on the last person you interacted with.

talents.name: Motivational speaker
talents.effects: You inspire and motivate your allies. Give your allies 1 resolve per resolve spent.

talents.name: Parley
talents.effects: You force a creature to parley with you, even if they are hostile or otherwise would not talk to you.

talents.name: Silver tongue
talents.effects: When haggling, roll 2d12 and use the result in place of silver coins.

talents.name: Ventriloquist
talents.effects: You can create sounds without moving your lips and make it seem like they originate from any point in medium range around you.

talents.name: Breaking affront
talents.effects: Roll a convincing check against a target to confuse it and G{gain +1 die for your next check against them} | G{break their concentration and make them lose their next action} | Y{gain +1 to your next check against them}.

talents.name: Challenge
talents.effects: Roll a influence check to challenge enemies around you: G{All enemies will focus you} | Y{One enemy will focus you} | Y{All enemies will focus you but deal +1 damage each when they attack}.

talents.name: Compulsive liar
talents.effects: When you roll a successful convincing check to lie you gain a stacking +1. The bonus is lost when you use a convincing check to tell the truth.

talents.name: Creative threats
talents.effects: When you roll convincing checks to intimidate someone, you may add a second skill, based on your threats and intimidation tactics to the check.

talents.name: Death glare
talents.effects: Roll a convincing check against a single target to stare them down: G{The target falls unconscious} | Y{The target tries to escape from you} | R{The target attacks you in rage}.

talents.name: Deja vu
talents.effects: Roll a convincing check to force a creature to repeat their last move G{exactly the same, regardless of the circumstances} | Y{roughly the same, based on the current situation}.

talents.name: Foulmouth
talents.effects: Roll a influence or performance check in front of a crowd, the audience is disgusted by your words and stops what they were doing G{until you leave} | Y{momentarily}

talents.name: Network
talents.effects: Roll a influence check to set up a secret meeting with a contact: The contact will be  G{trustworthy} | Y{dubious} | R{fraudulent}.

talents.name: Upsell
talents.effects: Sell an item for double the price.

talents.name: Yarnspinning
talents.effects: Roll a influence check to captivate an audience with tall tales of your exploits: G: The audience believes you | Y: The audience listens to you.

talents.name: Arcane affinity
talents.effects: You can roll an insight check to check your surroundings for traces of arcane magic: G: You gain the location and numbers of arcane sources in the vicinity | Y: You learn if there are arcane sources in the vicinity.

talents.name: Emotional insight
talents.effects: When successfully trying to determine lies you also gain a single word as to why the person you are talking to might lie, such as love, revenge, family, etc..

talents.name: Spot weakness
talents.effects: Roll an insight check to reveal a characters weakness: G: You also learn how to best exploit it.

talents.name: Torturer
talents.effects: When questioning a prisoner, choose a number between 1 and 10 and roll 1d10 for the prisoner. The higher the number, the more information you will gain, but if the roll is lower than your number, the prisoner falls unconscious, takes lasting damage or dies.

talents.name: Copycat
talents.effects: Roll a performance check to mimic any sound you heard before: the sound is  G: indistinguishable | Y: suspicious | R: noticable.

talents.name: Impressive
talents.effects: When you succeed on a performance check, choose one witness to impress and gain +1 die for any check that targets the witness until you leave the area.

talents.name: Infectious laughter
talents.effects: Roll a performance check to make your audience laugh G: so hard, they fall to the ground laughing

talents.name: Detective
talents.effects: Whenever you enter a room you have not been in yet, you gain information about one unusual thing that stands out, if there are any.

talents.name: False thoughts
talents.effects: You are immune to your mind being read, you even can present fake thoughts if your mind is being read.

talents.name: Iron will
talents.effects: When you are the target of mind effects you can instead take 2 (weak effect) or 4 (strong effect) damage and ignore the effect.

talents.name: Living compass
talents.effects: You always know the cardinal directions and the way you have been traveled.

talents.name: Telepath
talents.effects: You can telepathically communicate with creatures in your medium vicinity.

talents.name: Unerring eyes
talents.effects: Gain +1 die on any check to see through illusions. On a success you also G: get to ask a question about the nature of the illusion.

talents.name: Universal translator
talents.effects: You can understand every language but do not speak or write it.

talents.name: Eye for loot
talents.effects: When inspecting an item, roll a lore check to ask the GM G: 2 | Y: 1 questions about the item directly.

talents.name: Size up foes
talents.effects: Analyze a creature and gain information about one of the following things: strength, wealth, intelligence, relationship to you

talents.name: Battle medic
talents.effects: Roll a medicine check to reduce a creatures newest wound by G{2 lvls} | Y{1 lvl}.

talents.name: Feldsher
talents.effects: Roll a medicine check to remove 1 G{lvl 2 wound} | Y{lvl 1 wound}. This takes at least an hour of time.

talents.name: Fortifying treatment
talents.effects: Choose an ally during rest, they can remove an additional lvl 1 wound.

talents.name: Surgeon
talents.effects: Roll a medicine check with -1 die to heal the severely wounded: G{Heal a wound of any lvl} | R{Inflict a lvl 1 wound}

talents.name: Looking for rarities
talents.effects: Roll a vigilance check to search the market for a specific item: You find G{an exact version} | Y{a lesser version} of the item.

talents.name: Sharp senses
talents.effects: Checks that rely on smelling and hearing are made with +1 die.

talents.name: Chosen prey
talents.effects: Choose a creature type or specific creature during rest. You gain +1 for all checks relating to or against that creature.

talents.name: Handy pocket
talents.effects: As long as you have a free hand, you can keep a small item in it at all times unseen.

talents.name: Pack mule
talents.effects: You can carry a lot more weight, without being weighed down.

talents.name: Sticky feet
talents.effects: You stick to walls and ceilings.

talents.name: Swashbuckle
talents.effects: You gain +1 to all actions that are acrobatic and daring.

talents.name: Gotta go fast
talents.effects: Gain -1 die on an agility check to be unbelievably fast and nimble.

talents.name: Parkour
talents.effects: You do not need to roll checks to climb or run along walls and other obstacles. Climbing checks can also be ignored if the distance you want to cover is short enough.

talents.name: Armor damper
talents.effects: Your trickery checks ignore any potential negatives from wearing armor.

talents.name: Group stealth
talents.effects: Your allies can choose to use your trickery rolls for stealth and hiding when you move as a group.

talents.name: Lockpicking savant
talents.effects: Roll a trickery check to pick a lock: G{open the lock} | G{open the lock quickly but lose the lockpick} | Y{open the lock, but lose the lockpick} | Y{open the lock, but leave marks} | Y{open the lock slowly} | R{jam the lock}.

talents.name: Must be the wind
talents.effects: When you are spotted while sneaking or hiding, roll 1d6 and add it to your original check result. If the result would be successful now, remain hidden.

talents.name: Shadow stalker
talents.effects: Standing in the shadows adds +1 die to all trickery checks.

talents.name: Camouflage
talents.effects: You may use endurance instead of trickery for hiding. If you take a medium time, you can create a hideout that lets you skip the checks altogether.

talents.name: Expert tracker
talents.effects: When you roll checks to track a creature: G{gain knowledge of the specific creature from the GM}.

talents.name: Tracking mark
talents.effects: Mark a creature. You can follow a thin trail to the marked creature at all times.

talents.name: Trapper
talents.effects: Setting up traps takes you only a short time and most animals will not be able to find your traps.

talents.name: Alchemy
talents.effects: You can use alchemy formulas. Create alchemical ingredients by spending 1 resolve to create 5 ingredients. This talent allows you to learn more specialized alchemy talents.

talents.name: Bomber
talents.effects: Gain +1 die when creating explosives and bombs. Once per rest you can create a basic bomb without spending ingredients.

talents.name: Purest form
talents.effects: Choose an alchemy formula. You learn the chosen formula by heart and can craft it once per rest without rolling a check or spending ingredients.

talents.name: Quick alchemy
talents.effects: Instead of taking your time, you can create alchemy formulas as an action and during stressful situations.

talents.name: Brewer
talents.effects: You can use brewing recipes. Gather brewing ingredients by spending half a day and roll a survival check to gather the result as ingredients. This talent allows you to learn more specialized brewer talents.

talents.name: Infusion
talents.effects: Choose a brewer recipe to infuse your body with. You become immune to the effects and your body produces small amounts of it over time.

talents.name: Moonshiner
talents.effects: Gain +1 die when creating alcohol and drugs. Once per rest you can create a jug of strong alchohol without spending ingredients.

talents.name: Overload
talents.effects: When crafting potions and other brewer recipes, you can combine 2 recipes into one potion or poison.

talents.name: Spell absorption
talents.effects: When you are hit by a spell or an arcane effect, you can spend 5 ingredients to bottle a copy of the effect as a potion. When using the potion, roll a crafting check: R:{It explodes with the bottled effect.}

talents.name: Splash potions
talents.effects: When you create a brewing recipe, you can spend 1 more ingredient to make the potion or poison throwable, working its effect wherever it lands.

talents.name: Mutationist
talents.effects: You can use mutation genecasts. Harvest creatures to gain some of their genetic material used in the creation of mutations. Destroy a corpse and gain 1/2/3/4/5 special ingredients based on its size.

talents.name: Stable concoctions
talents.effects: You stabilize your mutations to inject them into others.

talents.name: Stitched together
talents.effects: You can activate up to 3 mutations at the same time in the same body.

talents.name: Swift extraction
talents.effects: When you damage a creature you can make a crafting check G{to harvest 1 special ingredient}.

talents.name: Craftology
talents.effects: Roll a crafting check. You can use it in place of any other check until your next rest.

talents.name: Honed nose
talents.effects: You can roll a crafting check to identify food and drink: You gain information about G{poisons, drugs etc.} | Y{tampering}.

talents.name: Heavy sleeper
talents.effects: Automatically remove either fatigue or stress during each rest.

talents.name: Night owl
talents.effects: Gain +1 resolve each rest.

talents.name: Apotheosis
talents.effects: Gain a permanent feature based on your chosen god and a talent fitting for that feature. Talk with your GM to work out the details.

talents.name: Cleanse
talents.effects: Spend a number of resolve to clear an influence from a target. Roll an insight check with additional dice equal to the number of resolve spent: G{You clear the influence} | Y{You stop the influence temporarily} | G{You transfer the influence to you}.

talents.name: Play with fate
talents.effects: Reroll any check and choose which result to use. However, fate will catch up to you, the GM can add conflict to any check you make until your next rest.

talents.name: Dreamer
talents.effects: You can enter a sleeping creatures dreams and interact with them or even try to manipulate them.

talents.name: Enter mind
talents.effects: You open up your mind to enter a creatures thoughts. Roll an insight check with -1 for each creature near your target: G{You read your targets thoughts} | Y{You read unclear and distorted thoughts} | R{You alert the target}.

talents.name: Firespeaker
talents.prerequisites: An Ambition relating to emotions or fire
talents.effects: Look into a fire and receive a foretelling of the future.

talents.name: Intervention TODO
talents.effects: Roll 1d20 to ask for direct help: G{They will help you directly} | Y{They will help you indirectly}. To recharge this talent, you have to prove yourself to your god.

talents.name: Lay on hands
talents.effects: Spend a number of resolve to use them on other creatures. They gain the number of resolve. Alternatively you can remove a sickness or disease per resolve spent.

talents.name: Lucky roll
talents.effects: Reroll 1 check, you must use the new result.

talents.name: Delay fate
talents.effects: Ignore the conflict of any check. The next time you gain conflict, it is stronger.

talents.name: Offer for guidance
talents.effects: Based on your offering roll between 1d6 and 5d6. You receive G{a clear and precise vision of what to do} | Y{a shrouded and vague vision}.

talents.name: Bargain fate
talents.effects: You can choose to roll a check with 1d20 instead of the normal dice.

talents.name: Quick prayer
talents.effects: Gain +1 to your next check that is made with the attribute most associated with your ambition.

talents.name: Reflection
talents.costs: You gain -2 resolve during your next rest.
talents.effects: Roll an insight check and ask any G{2} | Y{1} questions about things you experienced during the last day.

talents.name: Scrying
talents.effects: Consume an anchor, a piece from or an object of a creature and roll an insight check: You may do the following: G{Ask 2 questions about the target} | G{Watch the target from afar} | Y{Ask 1 question about the target} | R{The target notices you}

talents.name: Spirit communion
talents.effects: Roll an insight check to speak with a spirit or ghost: You G{speak with a cooperative spirit} | Y{speak with an uncooperative spirit} | R{anger the spirit}

talents.name: Weave reality
talents.effects: You can make cumulative checks to weave a fantastical tale. Spend 1 resolve to make one check. There is no limit to the number of checks you can make, but if you gain 3 failures, your progress is reset. The more successes you accumulate, the more real your story becomes.

talents.name: Antibodies
talents.effects: Reduce the effects of poisons and gain +1 die on checks made to withstand or shrug off poisons.

talents.name: Connoisseur
talents.effects: When ingesting food, drink, potions and poisons, roll 1d4: On a 1 receive no effect from it, on a 4 double the effects.

talents.name: Early bird
talents.effects: You ignore an instance of fatigue.

talents.name: Poison immunity
talents.effects: You become immune to all poisons.

talents.name: Hard noggin
talents.effects: You are immune to the effects of being drunk.

talents.name: Drunkards armor
talents.effects: Whenever you become drunk, gain 2 armor that last until you sober up.

talents.name: Shrug it off
talents.effects: When you gain a status effect you can choose to attack the nearest target with a skirmish check: G{End the effect} | Y{Suspend the effect until after your next action}.

talents.name: Animal companion
talents.prerequisites: At least +3 in either survival or convincing
talents.effects: Gain a small or medium creature as your companion. The creature can suffer a lvl 1 wound before dying.

talents.name: Beastmaster
talents.effects: You are able to control stronger companions. Your companion gains stats of their own: Distribute 1, 2, 3 for the following attributes: ST, DE, WI. The companions HEALTH is: TODO

talents.name: Special training
talents.effects: You can train your companion in more complex moves and abilities. Choose up to 4 moves from the companion moves list to train your companion in.

talents.name: Animal speech
talents.effects: You gain the ability to talk to animals.

talents.name: Shared consciousness
talents.effects: You can take control of your companion and see, feel and hear thorugh them while your body enters a trance like state of vulnerability.

talents.name: Magical conduit
talents.prerequisites: Animal companion, any talent that allows the casting of spells
talents.effects: You can use your companion as origin of your spell effects.

talents.name: Hamster cheeks
talents.effects: You can store up to 4 small items in your mouth.

talents.name: Copy cat
talents.effects: You can change your looks to that of another person, excluding their clothes.

talents.name: Shapeshift
talents.effects: You can shapeshift into small creatures of a chosen type: animal, plant, dragon, anomaly, elemental, fey, demon. Gain +1 to either ST or DE.

talents.name: Shapeshift 2
talents.effects: You can shapeshift into medium or large creatures of your chosen type. Distribute +3 to either ST or DE. You gain +1 - +1 - +0 empty wounds.

talents.name: Shapeshift 3
talents.effects: You can shapeshift into huge creatures of your chosen type. Distribute +5 to either ST or DE. You gain +2 - +2 - +1 empty wounds.

talents.name: Electrical conduit
talents.effects: You can choose to attract lightning and electricity in the vicinity and direct it to yourself. Doing so allows you to recharge a charge of any talent, but you will gain conflict.

talents.name: Running hot
talents.effects: While you are burning, you move with incredible speed and strength, increasing your DE and GE by +1.

talents.name: Ward of protection
talents.effects: When you learn this talent, choose a trinket or small item to imbue. When you are in danger, you can activate the trinket to skip a check. This does not count as success, conflict or failure, the action simply never happens.

talents.name: Bound item
talents.effects: When you learn this talent choose an item in your posession: You can telepathically move and materialise/dematerialise it. You can perform a ritual to bind another item, releasing the first.

talents.name: Spellslinger
talents.effects: Choose an attribute. When you use a talent, that requires a check and has the static tag, you can use your arcane skill instead of the stated skill for the talent.

talents.name: Lullaby
talents.effects: Roll a performance check to sing a lullaby: G{Everyone that hears you falls asleep} | Y{Everyone that hears you becomes tired and sleepy} | R{You fall asleep}

talents.name: WHAT?
talents.effects: You can choose to ignore any sound or sonic effects and filter only those you want to hear.

talents.name: Illusory double
talents.effects: You can create an illusory double that copies your movement and lasts a medium duration.

talents.name: Illusory clone
talents.effects: Your double can follow commands and act independently from you.

talents.name: Arcane armor
talents.effects: When you spend resolve to reduce conflict of arcane nature, reduce it again, as if you would spend another resolve.

talents.name: Spectral hand
talents.effects: Summon a magical hand for a medium duration.

talents.name: Permanent spectral hand
talents.effects: Your spectral hand becomes permanent. You can use charges from your spectral hand talent to summon additional hands for a medium duration.

talents.name: Invisibility
talents.effects: You and all that is on you when you use this talent turns invisible for a short duration.

talents.name: Fog control
talents.effects: You can create and manipulate a small fog cloud.

talents.name: Flashback
talents.effects: You travel back a short distance in time.

talents.name: Blink
talents.effects: You teleport to a visible location in medium range. Alternatively you can spend 2 charges to teleport to a location you know, but can not see. Does not work while restricted or grappled.

talents.name: Unshackled
talents.effects: You are slippery and can not be easily bound. Actions that require you to not be restricted or grappled, can still be executed by rolling a successful agility check.

talents.name: Sign of the maiden
talents.effects: Touch a creature to remove a lvl 1 wound from it.

talents.name: Sign of the archer
talents.effects: Roll a skirmish check (with 2 dice) to shoot G{4} | Y{2} | R{1} arrows.

talents.name: Sign of the betrayer
talents.effects: Touch a creature an roll a trickery check to inflict them with a poison: G{until it is treated} | Y{that is weaker} | Y{for a medium duration}. The poison will slowly eat away at the creatures strength, making them weaker until they fall unconscious.

talents.name: Sign of the king
talents.effects: Roll a performance check to inspire your allies: They gain G{+2 dice on their next 2 checks} | Y{+1 die on their next check}.

talents.name: Sign of the claw
talents.effects: Roll an agility check to grapple or restrict a medium or smaller creature within medium range of you: G{Until you release it} | Y{For as long as you actively hold the effect} | Y{For a short time}

talents.name: Sign of the clone
talents.effects: Roll a trickery check to create a small illusion quickly: G{The illusion will fool everyone at least once} | Y{The illusion will fool stupid creatures}.

talents.name: Sign of the bull
talents.effects: Gain +1 to all checks that use ST for a medium duration.

talents.name: Sign of the ram
talents.effects: Roll 2d6 and knock back a target a number of meters based on the results.

talents.name: Shimmering sphere
talents.effects: Create a small sphere around you. Everyone inside of the sphere is camouflaged and while standing absolutely still, invisible even.

talents.name: Sign of the sea
talents.effects: Roll an endurance check to allow G{3} | Y{1} creatures to breath underwater for a medium duration.

talents.name: Sign of sleep
talents.costs: You gain no resolve during your next rest.
talents.effects: Roll a vigilance check to distribute G{4} | Y{2} resolve between your allies. These can exceed their resolve maximum.

talents.name: Sign of the goat
talents.effects: Summon a small, otherworldly goat. It disappears after you rest.

talents.name: Heatvision
talents.effects: You gain the ability to see heat emanating from living creatures.

talents.name: Nekromancy
talents.effects: You may inflict a lvl 1 wound on yourself to instantly recover 5 arcane threads.

talents.name: Life drain
talents.effects: Whenever you inflict pain or damage on another creature, you may roll 1d4 and recover that many arcane threads instantly.

talents.name: Cursed soul
talents.effects: While you are cursed,

talents.name: Voodoo
talents.effects: You gain the ability to curse creatures by building small puppets made from materials of their body. You can use these puppets to indirectly control and manipulate the targets.
